mapper.select: SELECT uc.course_id, u.`name` teacherName, uc.user_id, uc.course_name, uc.user_name FROM user_course uc LEFT JOIN course c ON c.course_id = uc.course_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} AND u.del_flag = 0 AND u.state = '0' LIMIT #{start} , #{pageSize}
